content.raw: OK. That makes sense to me. I suppose having more information about each instance, especially in the case of validation or minibatch might be useful. If @hoffman approves of these intermediate result files then I’m okay with this too. If they do get approved the “Workdir files” in doc/technical.rst will need to be updated.
